plot: Makoto translates to 'honesty' or 'sincerity'. In this short documentary, filmmaker Christopher Makoto Yogi travels home to Hawaii to confront the death of his father, and finds peace through the simple act of talking.
title: Makoto: Or Honesty
plot_es: Makoto translates to 'honesty' or 'sincerity'. In this short documentary, filmmaker Christopher Makoto Yogi travels home to Hawaii to confront the death of his father, and finds peace through the simple act of talking.
plot_en: Makoto translates to 'honesty' or 'sincerity'. In this short documentary, filmmaker Christopher Makoto Yogi travels home to Hawaii to confront the death of his father, and finds peace through the simple act of talking.
